title: Problems with my client
body:
I cant open the game and if I open the whole launcher freeze and I have really good pc from the beginning i was 400 fps now i cant even launch normal game because of this new launcher please fix it i m from Bulgaria and I play at eune.
Here we have really big problems with the client

replies.body: I'm not entirely sure what issue you're having.  Are you freezing on the client, or while in a game?  If your frames are dropping while in-game, the cause could be bad game files or drivers.  The [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide should help tune things up!
